English:
< Restoration procedure initialized > 
Cache contains 23445 messages.. @w2  
< Restoring access restricted messages denied >
< Trying to restore unrestricted messages > @w2

One message found.
Chinese (simplified):
< 恢复程序初始化 > 
缓存包含 23445 条消息.. @w2 
< 正在恢复访问受限的消息被拒绝 >
< 尝试恢复无限制的消息 > @w2 

发现一条消息。

English: Evacuation alert! @w2 \nEnemy units have been detected at the edge of the solar system. @w2 <color=#ffffff>The teleport link to Omicron is down!</color> @w2 All non-military personnel proceed immediately to the transporters. All soldiers to battle stations! We'll show this silent plague the ropes! Good luck to us all.  \n- General Fazet, 3rd Croghum Elite Corps
Chinese (simplified): 疏散警报！@w2 在太阳系边缘探测到敌方单位。@w2 <color=#ffffff>通往Omicron的传送链接已断开！</color> @w2 所有非军事人员立即前往传送装置。所有士兵前往战斗岗位！我们要让这场沉默的瘟疫知道我们的厉害！祝我们所有人好运。\n- 法泽特将军，第三克罗格姆精英军团

English:
@q0Welcome, friend!  

What a rare occurrence. 
We haven't had a visitor from out of town in years. 

What brings you here?
Chinese (simplified):
@q0 欢迎，朋友！

多么罕见的事情。
我们好几年没有外地的访客了。

是什么风把你吹来的？

English: @q0Sounds important! \n\nIf I can, I'd be happy to help you out.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 听起来很重要！\n\n如果我能，我会很乐意帮助你。

English: Can you tell me something about the planet?
Chinese (simplified): 你能告诉我一些关于这个星球的事情吗？

English: Is there anything interesting to discover here?
Chinese (simplified): 这里有什么有趣的发现吗？

English: <color=#ffffff>Do you have something for me to do?</color>

@q0There is not much to tell. We thank our ancestors for a temperate climate, sufficient rain, fertile soil, and except for a few smaller beasts, there are no really dangerous creatures on the entire moon during the day. At night, however, you should be careful. Better find shelter and wait for the morning. Otherwise, there is a lush plant world that has something to offer in the different vegetation zones for almost every taste and for almost every medical application. Everything else we grow ourselves on our farms.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 没什么可说的。我们感谢我们的祖先赐予我们温和的气候、充足的雨水、肥沃的土壤，而且，除了一些较小的野兽外，在这个月亮上白天没有任何真正危险的生物。然而，到了晚上，你应该小心。最好找个避难所等待早晨。否则，这里有一个郁郁葱葱的植物世界，在不同的植被区域为几乎每一种口味和几乎每一种医疗应用提供了一些东西。我们自己在农场上种植其他所有的东西。

English: @q0Sure! I am the village chief of this settlement. This moon, as well as the others you see in the sky, are in a restricted area, so we rarely welcome any visitors. Even pirates and other riffraff we don't see often. However, there is not much to get here except some strange artifacts and some remains from ancient times. On the other moons it might look different. But we have no contact there and we are not really interested in it. Technology or its application - we do without it as good as we can.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 当然！我是这个定居点的村长。这个月亮，以及你在天空中看到的其他月亮，都在一个限制区域，所以我们很少欢迎任何访客。即使是海盗和其他流氓我们也很少见到。然而，这里没有太多东西可得，除了一些奇怪的文物和一些古代的遗迹。在其他月亮上可能会有所不同。但我们没有那里的联系，我们对它也不感兴趣。技术或其应用 - 我们尽可能地不需要它。

English: @q0There is some, like the fields of ruins. If you see a tall tower on the horizon, you can assume that there are a lot of old walls there, too. Then there are the artifacts of a species unknown to us. Some of the off-worlders must have tried to decipher them a long time ago. Their science stations, tech bunkers and surveillance camps can still be found. Some populated by disoriented robots left behind. <color=#ffffff>Maybe these legacies will help you in your search</color>!
Chinese (simplified): @q0 有一些地方，比如废墟的田野。如果你在地平线上看到一座高塔，你可以假设那里也有很多古老的墙壁。还有我们未知物种的遗迹。一些外来者一定很久以前就试图破译它们。他们的科学站、技术掩体和监视营地仍然可以找到。有些地方被留下的迷失方向的机器人占据。<color=#ffffff>也许这些遗留者会在你的搜索中帮助你</color>!

English: @q0There's always plenty to do here in our settlements. Just go to the people on the <color=#ffffff>farms</color> and <color=#ffffff>plantations </color>and ask them what you can do for them. \n\nCome back later. Maybe I'll have a task for you then too.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 在我们定居点这里总有很多事情可以做。只要去找农场和种植园的人，问问你能为他们做些什么。 \n\n晚点再来。也许那时我也有任务给你。

English: @q0Hello friend! Have you already found something in your search? \n\nCan I help you with something?
Chinese (simplified): @q0 你好朋友！你已经找到搜索的东西了吗？\n\n我能帮你什么吗？

English: @q0Sure, my friend!\n\nWhat would you like to know?
Chinese (simplified): @q0 当然，我的朋友！\n\n你想知道什么？

English: @q0Welcome back, friend!  \n\nHave you changed your mind? Can I help you with anything?
Chinese (simplified): @q0 欢迎回来，朋友！\n\n你改变主意了吗？我能帮你什么吗？

English: I have a few questions, if you don't mind.
Chinese (simplified): 我有几个问题，如果你不介意的话。

English: @d0 @q0What else would you like to know?
Can you tell me something about you and your people?
Chinese (simplified): 你能告诉我一些关于你和你的人民的事情吗？

English: @q0Welcome back, friend!  \n\nCan I help you with anything?
Chinese (simplified): @q0 欢迎回来，朋友！\n\n我能帮你什么吗？

English: Your kind is not welcome here. \n\nGet lost!
Chinese (simplified): 你的种族在这里不受欢迎。\n\n滚开！

English: Where can I find him? (See HUD marker)
Chinese (simplified): 我在哪里可以找到他？（见HUD标记）

English:
I am afraid that there is nothing to do at the moment.

Come back here later.  I'm pretty sure I'll have something for you!

You can of course also visit the <color=#ffffff>other farms and plantations</color> and offer your help!
Chinese (simplified):
恐怕目前没有什么可做的。

过会儿再来。我相当确定我会有事给你做！

当然，你也可以去<color=#ffffff>其他农场和种植园</color>提供帮助！

English: Can I help you with something?
I have been sent here with a task.
Chinese (simplified): 我被派到这里来执行一项任务。

English: @q0 @d0Please be so good, go to the <color=#ffffff>plantations </color>and talk to their <color=#ffffff>foremen</color>. They should have already collected the harvest in some <color=#ffffff>sacks </color>there. \n\n<color=#ffffff>Pick up whatever is in the sacks</color> and bring it back to me or to one of the other farms.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 请行行好，去<color=#ffffff>种植园</color>和他们的<color=#ffffff>工头</color>谈谈。他们应该已经在那里的<color=#ffffff>袋子</color>里收集了收获。\n\n<color=#ffffff>拿起袋子里的东西</color>并把它带回给我或另一个农场。

English: @q0 @d0To increase our yield on the plantations and farms, we use a certain <color=#ffffff>mushroom extract</color> that only can be obtained from certain plants in the snow zones of the <color=#ffffff>mountains</color>. The extract is harvested from the  '' .. also called 'Brain Fungus'. You will see, why.\n\nWould you go on a quest and get us the <color=#ffffff>mushroom extract</color> (x2)?.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 为了增加我们在种植园和农场的产量，我们使用一种特殊的<color=#ffffff>蘑菇提取物</color>，这种提取物只能从<color=#ffffff>山区</color>的雪区的某些植物中获得。这种提取物是从''..也被称为'大脑真菌'中收获的。你会明白为什么。\n\n你会去执行任务并给我们带来<color=#ffffff>蘑菇提取物</color>（x2）吗？

English: @q0 @d0For the upcoming festivities, we will brew a special libation from a particular species of lichen. However, this lichen lives only on a special surface rock called < translating .. Cobalt >. It is most commonly found in northern latitudes, such as the <color=#ffffff>tundra</color> and <color=#ffffff>cold plains</color>. If you dissect the rock, you can find the lichen quite safely.\n\nWould you get us some of this <color=#ffffff>brewing lichen </color>(x3)?
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 为了即将到来的节日，我们将从一种特殊的地衣中酿造一种特殊的饮料。然而，这种地衣只生长在一种特殊的地表岩石上，称为<翻译中..钴>。它最常见于北纬地区，如<color=#ffffff>苔原</color>和<color=#ffffff>寒冷平原</color>。如果你开采岩石，可以相当安全地找到地衣。\n\n你能给我们带来一些这种<color=#ffffff>酿造地衣</color>（x3）吗？

English: @q0 @d0We need some spare parts for the irrigation pumps as soon as possible, but there are no off-world traders here. But we could deconstruct some of the <color=#ffffff>robots </color>that patrol around the <color=#ffffff>tech ruins</color> and <color=#ffffff>other wreckages</color>. But we are not equipped for that. \n\nIn case you want to help us, please bring <color=#ffffff>pump spare parts</color> (x4) to me or to one of the other farms.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 我们急需灌溉泵的备件，但这里没有来自外星的商人。但我们可以从巡逻在<color=#ffffff>技术废墟</color>和其他<color=#ffffff>残骸</color>的<color=#ffffff>机器人</color>中拆除一些。但我们没有装备来做这件事。\n\n如果你想帮助我们，请把<color=#ffffff>泵备件</color>（x4）带给我或任何一个农场。

English: @q0 @d0It seems to be a trend for off-worlders to buy our clothes, but unfortunately there is only one source from which to tan good leather as a base material: the <color=#ffffff>skin of the big night raptors</color> that patrol around the big <color=#ffffff>Tribal Tower</color> and its surrounding ruins at night. Be careful. These beasts are tough.\n\nBring me the<color=#ffffff> night raptor skins</color> (x5) so we can start working again.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 看起来外地人喜欢买我们的衣服，但不幸的是，只有一个来源可以鞣制好的皮革作为基础材料：那就是在夜晚巡逻在大<color=#ffffff>部落塔</color>及其周围废墟的<color=#ffffff>夜行猛禽</color>的皮。小心，这些野兽和它们的皮一样坚硬。\n\n带给我<color=#ffffff>夜行猛禽皮</color>（x5），这样我们就可以重新开始工作了。

English: @q0 @d0 What task brings you to me here?\n\nLet's hear it.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 什么任务让你来到这里？\n\n让我们听听看。

English:
I'm sorry, friend. It seems like you're more than busy with your current assignment.

Finish it, and I'll be sure to have something for you again!

See you later!
Chinese (simplified):
朋友，很抱歉。看起来你目前的任务已经够忙的了。

完成后，我肯定会有事情给你做！

再见！

English: @p0 @d0 Very nice!\n\nKeep up the good work!
Chinese (simplified): @p0 @d0 非常好！\n\n继续保持好工作！

English: @q0 Hello friend!\n\nWhat business brings you to my humble farm?
Chinese (simplified): @q0 你好，朋友！\n\n是什么风把你吹到我的小农场来的？

English: @q0 @d0 Hello, son!\n\nNice day for some enjoyable farm work, ain't it?
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 你好，孩子！\n\n今天是个做农活的好天气，不是吗？

English: @q0 @d0For next season we need to start improving our compost and nutrient fertilizer now.  The clutches of <color=#ffffff>telluropods</color> in the <color=#ffffff>swamps</color> and the <color=#ffffff>marshes</color> would make the ideal admixture for this. The only problem is, the telluropods always carry their clutches around with them and don't give them up voluntarily....\n\nWould you go to the swamps and get us some<color=#ffffff> telluropod clutches</color> (x5)?
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 为了下一季，我们现在就需要开始改进我们的堆肥和营养肥料。<color=#ffffff>沼泽</color>和<color=#ffffff>湿地</color>中的<color=#ffffff>地壳足虫</color>的卵会是理想的添加剂。唯一的问题是，地壳足虫总是带着它们的卵，不会自愿放弃...\n\n你会去沼泽地为我们弄一些<color=#ffffff>地壳足虫卵</color>（x5）吗？

English: @q0 @d0For generations we have been growing grain here and in the other farms and fields. Unfortunately, our seed is deteriorating due to constant stretching. We desperately need fresh samples of the wild form. Unfortunately, they are only available in <color=#ffffff>water and beach zones</color> of the <color=#ffffff>swamp areas</color> - guarded by the dangerous <color=#ffffff>tellurpods</color>.\n\nWill you help us to find samples of the <color=#ffffff>wild grain seed</color> (x4) anyway?
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 几代人以来，我们一直在这里的农场和其他农田种植谷物。不幸的是，我们的种子由于不断的拉伸而恶化。我们迫切需要新鲜的野生样本。不幸的是，它们只有在<color=#ffffff>沼泽区</color>的<color=#ffffff>水域和海滩区域</color>才有——由危险的<color=#ffffff>地壳足虫</color>守护。\n\n你会帮助我们找到<color=#ffffff>野生谷物种子</color>（x4）的样本吗？

English: @q0 @d0Working on the Farms and Plantations involves many risks. From sunburns to deep cuts. Under certain circumstances, the <color=#ffffff>butterflies in the forests</color> secrete a sweetish secretion that we use as a basic ingredient for many medicines. Unfortunately, you have to <color=#ffffff>kill </color>these lovely little creatures for it....\n\nWould you collect <color=#ffffff>butterfly secretion</color> (x2) for us?
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 在农场和种植园工作涉及许多风险。从晒伤到深割伤。在某些情况下，<color=#ffffff>森林中的蝴蝶</color>分泌一种甜味的分泌物，我们将其用作许多药物的基本成分。不幸的是，你必须<color=#ffffff>杀死</color>这些可爱的小生物来获取它...\n\n你能为我们收集<color=#ffffff>蝴蝶分泌物</color>（x2）吗？

English: @q0 @d0I'm glad you're here. We're almost out of ammo for our weapons to keep those pesky raptors off our backs. Someone has to go back to one of the <color=#ffffff>farms</color> and get new ammunition for our crossbows from the warehouse. Right now I can't send anyone - can you take over that task?\n   \nIn this case, please <color=#ffffff>speak to the foreman</color> and bring the <color=#ffffff>crossbow ammo</color> (x1) to me or to one of the other plantations.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 我很高兴你在这里。我们的武器弹药几乎用完了，这些武器是用来抵御那些烦人的猛禽的。有人得回到<color=#ffffff>农场</color>去，从仓库里拿新的弹药给我们的十字弓。现在我不能派人去——你能接手这个任务吗？\n\n如果是这样，请<color=#ffffff>和领班说话</color>，把<color=#ffffff>十字弓弹药</color>（x1）带给我或者其它的种植园。

English: @q0 @d0 Very good. \n\nLet's see what we have here:
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 非常好。\n\n让我们看看我们这里有什么：

English: @q0 @d0 Very good. \n\nLet's see what we have here:
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 非常好。\n\n让我们看看我们这里有什么：

English: @q0 @d0 Very good. \n\nLet's see what we have here:
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 非常好。\n\n让我们看看我们这里有什么：

English: @q0 @d0 Very good. \n\nLet's see what we have here:
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 非常好。\n\n让我们看看我们这里有什么：

English: @q0 @d0 Very good. \n\nLet's see what we have here:
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 非常好。\n\n让我们看看我们这里有什么：
收集奖励。(+ 泰隆派系声望)

English: Well, have fun browsing. \n\nLet me know if you've changed your mind.
Chinese (simplified): 嗯，祝你游览愉快。\n\n如果你改变了主意，告诉我。

English: Sure thing.  \n\nLet me know when you change your mind.
Chinese (simplified): 当然可以。\n\n当你改变主意的时候告诉我。
温润的月亮 种植园

English: @q0 @d0 Welcome to the Talon QUEST archive! The archive lists all ACTIVE quests you have currently picked from the Talon faction. Please make a selection from the following options! (Location/Quest Type) Note: Quests are only repeatable as long as the targeted structures are not destroyed/looted or NPCs/creatures respawned. [The quests are still heavily work in progress as of EXP v1.8]
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 欢迎来到 泰隆 任务档案！ 任务档案列出了你当前从泰隆派系挑选的所有活跃任务。 请选择以下选项之一！（位置/任务类型） 注意：只要目标结构没有被摧毁/洗劫或NPC/生物重生，任务就是可重复的。[截至EXP v1.8，任务仍在大力进行中]

English:
Our medic has delivered a few here in the last few days. They work better than the stuff from the quacks of the outside world.

I think I have it inside on one of the <color=#ffffff>shelves </color>or in a <color=#ffffff>dresser</color>. 
Take it all with you. The other farms might have more.
Chinese (simplified):
我们的医生在过去的几天里送了一些到这里。它们比外面那些庸医的东西效果更好。

我把它们留在了里面的一个<color=#ffffff>架子 </color>上或者一个<color=#ffffff>抽屉柜</color>里。
带上它们。其他农场可能还有更多。

English: Ah yes. I was wondering because no one came to pick them up. I thought the problem with the raptors had been solved. I'm not sure if the ammo is still there. Check the <color=#ffffff>wooden box</color>. That's where I put the ammo at least quite a while ago.\n\nIf someone has already taken them, it's best to visit one of the <color=#ffffff>other farms</color>.
Chinese (simplified): 啊，是的。我在想因为没有人来取它们。我以为和猛禽的问题已经解决了。我不确定弹药是否还在。检查一下<color=#ffffff>木箱</color>。那是我放弹药的地方，但那是很久以前的事了。\n\n如果有人已经拿走了，最好去参观一下<color=#ffffff>其他农场</color>。

English: At the moment, unfortunately, it goes haywire and there are currently all kinds of problems. The worker who is responsible for the delivery is also on the road elsewhere. So I can't say right now if we have already delivered or not. \n\nIf there is nothing in the <color=#ffffff>sacks</color> over there, I am sure that the <color=#ffffff>other plantations</color> will be happy if you bring their harvest to the farms.
Chinese (simplified): 目前，不幸的是，一切都乱套了，现在有各种各样的问题。负责送货的工人也在别的路上。所以我现在还不能说我们是否已经送过货了。\n\n如果那边的<color=#ffffff>麻袋</color>里什么都没有，我相信<color=#ffffff>其他种植园</color>会很高兴如果你能将他们的收成送到农场。

English:
Oh yes, that would be very important that the seeds go to the farms, otherwise the next season will be cancelled.

We have everything prepared and collected in the <color=#ffffff>buckets </color>over there.

I'm sure the other plantations would appreciate your help with that too!
Chinese (simplified):
哦，是的，种子送到农场是非常重要的，否则下一季将会被取消。

我们所有的一切都已经准备好并收集在那边的<color=#ffffff>桶 </color>里。

我相信其他的种植园也会感激你在这方面的帮助！

English: Seriously? Have you looked in the Tech Ruins yet? If you don't find anything there... well... Tannin can also be made from urine. Just look over the plantation... I'm pretty sure you might find something at the edge of the field. Haha...\n\nAlso, don't forget to check the other plantations,too. Haha..
Chinese (simplified): 真的吗？你看过技术废墟了吗？如果你在那里找不到任何东西...嗯...丹宁也可以从尿液中提取。只要看看种植园...我敢肯定你可能会在田地边缘找到一些东西。哈哈...\n\n另外，别忘了检查其他种植园。哈哈...

English: @d0  While we are here researching artifacts, some from the academy have begun to set up experimental farms. Maybe a good idea. Depending on how long we stay here, it might be nice to have something to eat other than the ration packs that are delivered. Kyrr is already joking about him becoming the '<color=#ffffff>settlement chief</color>'. I'll put the coordinates of his farm for the next .. gastronomic excursion .. to the database. \n-Tash
Chinese (simplified): @d0 我们在这里研究文物时，学院的一些人已经开始建立实验农场。也许是个不错的主意。根据我们在这里停留的时间，有除了送达的配给包之外的东西吃可能很好。Kyrr已经在开玩笑说他会成为'<color=#ffffff>定居点酋长</color>'。我会把他农场的坐标放到数据库里，供下一次...美食之旅...使用。\n-Tash

English: @d0 Please make a choice.\n\nNote: This is a user administered database. No guarantee for completeness or correctness of the entries!
Chinese (simplified): @d0 请做出选择。\n\n注意：这是一个用户管理的数据库。条目的完整性或正确性没有保证！

English:
@d0 Attention! You are accessing private data. If you are not Tash Aki Talen, please contact the network administrator immediately. Your account may have been compromised!
< error >
< Database incomplete >
< error >
Chinese (simplified):
@d0 注意！您正在访问私人数据。如果您不是Tash Aki Talen，请立即联系网络管理员。您的账户可能已经被入侵了！
<错误>
<数据库不完整>
<错误>

English:
@d0 - Neutral insect but will taunt when in close proximity to the survivor.
- Tends to travel in groups.
- Is very protective of its food source. Can be provoked if the survivor does not retreat away from the source in question.
- Slower movement until it attacks. Once provoked, will run at its target.
- Located in almost all biomes.
- Cannot be domesticated.
Chinese (simplified):
@d0 - 中立的昆虫，但当与幸存者近距离接触时会挑衅。
- 倾向于成群结队地旅行。
- 对其食物来源非常保护。如果幸存者不从有问题的来源撤退，可能会被激怒。
- 移动较慢，直到攻击。一旦被激怒，就会向目标跑去。
- 几乎在所有生态区域都有。
- 不能被驯化。

English:
@d0 - Friendly herbivore
- Flees when attacked
- Moves in herds.
- Can live in almost any environment, eg. Savanna and Cold Plains
- Farmers are trying to domesticate them; herbivore,
Chinese (simplified):
@d0 - 友好的食草动物
- 被攻击时逃跑
- 以群体移动。
- 几乎可以在任何环境中生活，例如热带草原和寒冷的平原
- 农民们正试图驯化它们；食草动物

English:
@d0 - Neutral Scavenger
- Will not attack unless provoked.
- Generally roams in a solitary fashion
- Slower movement.
- Larger teeth, giant claws, and spiked tail make for a fearsome appearance, but is generally docile.
- Often found near forests, meadows, and dust bowls.
Chinese (simplified):
@d0 - 中立的食腐动物
- 除非被激怒，否则不会攻击。
- 通常单独漫游
- 移动较慢。
- 更大的牙齿、巨大的爪子和带刺的尾巴使它看起来可怕，但通常很温顺。
- 经常在森林、草地和沙尘暴附近发现。

English:
@d0 - Friendly herbivore
- Flees when attacked.
- Lives in small and larger groups 
- Very tough animal that can be seen in various environments, except very hot areas
- Often seen in grassland, plains and low mountain areas
Chinese (simplified):
@d0 - 友好的食草动物
- 被攻击时逃跑。
- 生活在小群和大群中
- 非常坚韧的动物，可以在各种环境中看到，除了非常热的地区
- 经常在草原、平原和低山地区看到

English:
@d0 - Aggressive hunter
- Lives primarily on coasts, shores and lakes.  
- Can live in and out of water. 
- Mostly found on temperate planets in marsh and swamp areas, but can be found in many environments if not too cold or too hot as long as there is an open water area nearby.
Chinese (simplified):
@d0 - 好斗的猎人
- 主要生活在海岸、海岸和湖泊。
- 可以在水中和水外生活。
- 主要发现在温带行星的沼泽和沼泽地区，但如果不是特别冷或特别热，只要有开放的水域，也可以在许多环境中找到。

English:
@d0 - Dangerous hunter
- During the day they move in families ( mother & young raptors )
- At night single larger adults go hunting.
- Often seen in savanna and dust bowls, but also in cold plains and tundra
Chinese (simplified):
@d0 - 危险的猎人
- 在白天它们以家庭为单位移动（母龙和幼龙）
- 在夜晚，较大的成年龙单独狩猎。
- 经常在热带草原和沙尘暴地区看到，但在寒冷的平原和苔原也能看到

English: Will do! Thank you very much!
Does the name <color=#ffffff>Tash Aki Talen</color> mean anything to you?
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>塔什·阿基·塔伦</color>这个名字对你来说意味着什么？

English: @q0Not really. Although. There are a few stories from a time before the glorious Zirax Empire - almost a millennium and a half ago. The name appears now and then in connection with the artifacts and a war of silence. She probably played an important role in it, but what exactly is not handed down. In any case, this Tash is no longer here ... I'd be very surprised. Ha. More information should be available to you from the elders on <color=#ffffff>OMICRON</color>, our original <color=#ffffff>lovely arid home planet in this system.</color>
Chinese (simplified): @q0 并不是真的。尽管如此。在光荣的兹瑞克斯帝国之前，大约一千五百年前，有一些故事。这个名字时不时地与遗迹和一场沉默之战联系在一起。她可能在其中扮演了重要角色，但具体是什么并没有流传下来。无论如何，这个塔什已经不在这里了……如果她在，我会非常惊讶。哈哈。你应该能从<color=#ffffff>OMICRON</color>上的长者那里得到更多信息，这是我们在这个星系中的原始<color=#ffffff>可爱的干旱家园行星。</color>

English: Thanks a lot for all the info! Goodbye.
Chinese (simplified): 非常感谢你提供的所有信息！再见。

English: @q0Well. Depending on which of the elders you ask, we as Talon should not have the best opinion of the 'Glorious Zirax Empire'. If you believe the lore, the Zirax subjugated the Talon and forbade them any higher technology. Whether that is true - I don't know. Either way, since 1368 standard years, the 'GZE' time system has been in effect in the galaxy, but we are not dependent on the Zirax or anyone else for our way of life. In my opinion, it can stay that way.
Chinese (simplified): 嗯。取决于你问的是哪位长老，我们泰隆人不应该对‘光荣的兹瑞克斯帝国’有最好的看法。如果你相信传说，兹瑞克斯征服了泰隆人，并禁止他们使用任何高级技术。那是不是真的 - 我不知道。无论如何，自1368标准年以来，‘GZE’时间系统已经在银河系生效，但我们的生活方式并不依赖于兹瑞克斯或任何其他人。在我看来，可以保持这样。

English: Ah..yes, the Zirax. What are your experiences with them?
Chinese (simplified): 啊..是的，兹瑞克斯。你对他们有什么经验？
查询： 查看当前时间 +GZE +TZA +2473

English:
@q0<color=#00e1ff>G</color>alactic <color=#00e1ff>I</color>nformation <color=#00e1ff>N</color>etwork @w1 
.. TZA .. 4104.153 .. @w1
.. GZE .. 1368.153 .. @w2
.. Received timestamp information from remote mobile device .. 2473 @w1
.. Anomaly detected. Cannot proceed. @w1
<color=#ffffff>.. Use a console connected to the network to continue!</color>
Chinese (simplified):
@q0 <color=#00e1ff>G</color>alactic <color=#00e1ff>I</color>nformation <color=#00e1ff>N</color>etwork @w1 
.. TZA .. 4104.153 .. @w1 
.. GZE .. 1368.153 .. @w2 
.. 从远程移动设备接收到的时间戳信息 .. 2473 @w1 
.. 检测到异常。无法继续。@w1 
<color=#ffffff>.. 使用连接到网络的控制台继续！</color>

English: Have there been <color=#ffffff>any recent visitors</color> with THIS logo on their suits or vessels?
Chinese (simplified): 最近有<color=#ffffff>任何访客</color>的服装或飞船上有这个标志吗？

English: Hmm ... let's see. @w2  No, I have never seen it here before. No one from the off-worlders has been here in the last few months anyway. If you want to find those people, you should look on our original homeworld of <color=#ffffff>Omicron</color>. Conveniently located here <color=#ffffff>in this solar system</color>. If you've arrived by ship, you've certainly passed by there. Ask the elders or the off-worlders there. Maybe they can help you!
Chinese (simplified): @q0 嗯...让我们看看。@w2 不，我以前在这里从未见过它。反正在过去的几个月里，没有来自外星世界的人来过这里。如果你想找到那些人，你应该去我们的原始家园<color=#ffffff>OMICRON</color>。就在这里<color=#ffffff>在这个太阳系</color>。如果你是乘船来的，你肯定已经路过那里了。问问那里的长者或外星世界的人。也许他们可以帮助你！
<color=#00ffff>指导教程：基地（BP）- 方块 & 设备</color>

English: @q0 @d0 To equip your base with the essentials you need a <color=#fbff00>Core</color> and a power supply. Either a <color=#fbff00>Capacitor (Solar)</color> plus <color=#fbff00>Solar Panels</color> or conventionally a <color=#ffae00>Small Generator</color> plus a <color=#ffae00>Fuel Tank</color>. To secure your shelter, you will also need an <color=#fbff00>Automatic Door</color> and <color=#fbff00>Windows L</color> (8x). <color=#fbff00>Stairs </color>wouldn't be bad either! Also craft a <color=#fbff00>building block</color> (Carbon or Wood) to fix the roof of the shelter! Use the <color=#ffffff>Portable Constructor</color> to build everything. The required templates are <color=#fbff00>marked</color> in the overview below.  @w2 <color=#ffffff>After having build the devices, equip them to your toolbar to continue the tutorial!</color>
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 为了给您的基地配备必需品，您需要一个<color=#fbff00>核心</color>和一个电源供应。可以是<color=#fbff00>电容器（太阳能）</color>加上<color=#fbff00>太阳能板</color>，或者传统方式使用<color=#ffae00>小型发电机</color>加上<color=#ffae00>燃料箱</color>。为了保护您的避难所，您还需要一个<color=#fbff00>自动门</color>和<color=#fbff00>窗户L</color>（8个）。<color=#fbff00>楼梯</color>也是一个不错的选择！同时，制作一个<color=#fbff00>建筑方块</color>（碳或木头）来修复避难所的屋顶！使用<color=#ffffff>便携式建造机</color>建造一切。所需的模板在下面的概览中<color=#fbff00>标记</color>。@w2 <color=#ffffff>建造完设备后，将它们装备到您的工具栏上，以继续教程！</color>

English: How to find the necessary materials?

@q0 @d0 For the production you primarily need <color=#ffffff>carbon substrate</color>, <color=#ffffff>iron</color>, <color=#ffffff>copper</color> and <color=#ffffff>silicon</color>. All materials can be found in various biomes as lumps of ore. @w2\nIf you want a higher yield, use your <color=#ffffff>handheld detector</color> and <color=#ffffff>scan for underground ore deposits</color>. The Robinson Protocol will give you further instructions when you have discovered such a deposit. @w2\nIf you cannot find anything, look around for old mining sites or camps! Someone might have left some notes where to find the resources!
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 制造主要需要<color=#ffffff>碳复合材料</color>、<color=#ffffff>铁</color>、<color=#ffffff>铜</color>和<color=#ffffff>硅</color>。所有材料都可以在各种生物群落中作为矿石块找到。@w2 \n如果你想获得更高的产量，请使用你的<color=#ffffff>手持探测器</color>并<color=#ffffff>扫描地下矿藏</color>。当你发现这样的矿藏时，罗宾逊协议会给出进一步的指示。@w2 \n如果你找不到任何东西，可以寻找旧的采矿场或营地！有人可能留下了一些笔记，告诉你在哪里可以找到资源！

English: @q0 @d0Very good. With the core and a generator and fuel tank you can put your base into operation.  Of course, first you need to fill a fuel into the tank. In the simplest case, create <color=#ffffff>BioFuel</color> with the <color=#ffffff>Portable Constructor.</color> If you have this in your inventory, open the Control Panel (<color=#00ff11>P</color>) and use the <color=#00ff11>MANAGE</color> button below the Fuel Tank display. In the next window drag the fuel into the tank.  If the base does not activate automatically, press <color=#00ff11>Y</color> or drag the <color=#00ff11>POWER</color> slider in the control panel to ON. @p9 @q0 @d0If you have not yet completed the other components (window, door, stairs and roof repair), you can proceed with this.  \n\nIf you want to activate the second part of the Guided Tutorial, select the corresponding answer below to read the instructions!
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 非常好。有了核心、一个发电机和一个油箱，你就可以让你的基地运行了。当然，首先你需要给油箱加油。最简单的情况下，使用<color=#ffffff>便携式建造机</color>制造<color=#ffffff>生物燃料</color>。如果你的库存中有这个，打开控制面板（<color=#00ff11>P</color>），并使用油箱显示下方的<color=#00ff11>管理</color>按钮。在下一个窗口中，将燃料拖入油箱。如果基地没有自动激活，按<color=#00ff11>Y</color>或将控制面板中的<color=#00ff11>电力</color>滑块拖到ON。@p9 @q0 @d0 如果你还没有完成其他组件（窗户、门、楼梯和屋顶修复），你可以继续进行。\n\n如果你想激活引导教程的第二部分，请选择下面相应的答案来阅读说明！

English: <color=#ffae00>I do want to continue on my own.</color>

Chinese (simplified): 指导教程： 基础 (BP) - 基础

English: @d0 @q0The Survival Tool has three working modes that you can set with a <color=#44ff00>right mouse</color> click: <color=#ffffff>Defense</color>, <color=#ffffff>Resource </color>and <color=#ffffff>Salvage</color>. \n\nThe <u>Resource mode</u> is especially important! Use it to gather <color=#ffffff>wood</color> from trees and <color=#ffffff>carbon</color> from resource rocks <u>early on</u> to <color=#ffffff>build your first shelter</color> as soon as possible! You can also use it to destroy plants, stones and other obstacles that are in your way or prevent you from picking something up!
Chinese (simplified): @d0 @q0 生存工具有三种工作模式，你可以通过<color=#44ff00>右键点击</color>来设置：<color=#ffffff>防御</color>、<color=#ffffff>资源 </color>和<color=#ffffff>回收</color>。 \n\n<u>资源模式</u>尤其重要！用它从树木中收集<color=#ffffff>木头</color>，从资源岩石中收集<color=#ffffff>碳</color>，<u>尽早</u>建造你的第一座庇护所！你也可以使用它来摧毁挡在你的路上的植物、石头和其他障碍物，或者阻止你捡起某样东西！

English: @q0 @d0 You can find all <color=#ffffff>(video) manuals</color> filed in the '<color=#ffffff>Tutorial</color>' tab of the PDA (<color=#44ff00>F1</color>) under '(Video) Manuals' ! For more details on game mechanics, game content, resources, possible activities and much more, check out the knowledge entries in the '<color=#ffffff>Empyriopedia</color>' tab of the PDA (<color=#44ff00>F1</color>) and don't forget to use the '<color=#00ffff>Send in your Game Feedback</color>' ingame form!\n\nNote: The <color=#ffffff>Robinson protocol</color> monitors your first-time actions. <color=#00ffff>Pay attention to the messages that appear!</color> These contain important information!
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 你可以在PDA（<color=#44ff00>F1</color>）的'<color=#ffffff>教程</color>'标签下的'(视频)手册'中找到所有的<color=#ffffff>（视频）手册</color>！有关游戏机制、游戏内容、资源、可能的活动等更多详细信息，请查看PDA（<color=#44ff00>F1</color>）中'<color=#ffffff>帝国百科</color>'标签下的知识条目，并不要忘记使用游戏内的'<color=#00ffff>发送你的游戏反馈</color>'表单！\n\n注意：<color=#ffffff>鲁宾逊协议</color>监控你的首次行动。<color=#00ffff>注意出现的消息！</color>这些包含重要信息！

English: @q0 @d0 To build your first base, we recommend using <color=#ffffff>wood</color> or <color=#ffffff>carbon substrate</color>. You can of course also use iron. With one of these materials we build a construction frame with the Blueprint Factory (<color=#44ff00>F2</color>).  How this works is described in the next window.  \n\nPlease click on <color=#ffffff>CONTINUE</color> if you want to start now. Click on MAYBE LATER if you have changed your mind. In this case you can always start the tutorial again in the 'Tutorial Tab' of the PDA (<color=#44ff00>F1</color>)!
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 为了建造你的第一个基地，我们建议使用<color=#ffffff>木头</color>或<color=#ffffff>碳复合材料</color>。当然，你也可以使用碎石或铁。用这些材料之一，我们在蓝图工厂（<color=#44ff00>F2</color>）建造一个建筑框架。下个窗口描述了这是如何工作的。 \n\n如果你想现在开始，请单击<color=#ffffff>继续</color>。如果你改变了主意，请点击<color=#ffffff>也许稍后</color>。在这种情况下，你可以随时在PDA的'<color=#ffffff>教程标签</color>'中重新开始教程（<color=#44ff00>F1</color>）！

English:
@d0 This moon has a good amount of carbon, iron, copper and silicon. The materials can be found both as  <color=#ffffff>ore rocks on the surface</color> and as <color=#ffffff>underground ore deposits</color>.  To find the latter requires the use of a manual detector.  Where there are the ore rocks, there is sometimes an underground deposit in the <color=#ffffff>same biome</color>! 

See page 2 for an overview of the most common ore rocks. @p9 @d0 <color=#ffffff>Carbon</color> ore rocks are found in the plains, grasslands, savannah, and lower hills.
<color=#ffffff>Iron</color> ore rock is found from the low hills to the high mountains.  
<color=#ffffff>Copper</color> ore rock is found wherever there are (some) trees or a forest.  
<color=#ffffff>Silicon</color> ore rock is found on shores and under or near water.
Note: In more dangerous areas, be it by environmental conditions or creatures, there are rarely also other, <color=#ffffff>more valuable materials</color>....
Chinese (simplified):
@d0 这个卫星含有大量的碳、铁、铜和硅。这些材料既可以在<color=#ffffff>地表的矿石</color>中找到，也可以作为<color=#ffffff>地下矿藏</color>。要找到后者需要使用手动探测器。在有矿石的地方，有时候在<color=#ffffff>同一生态区域</color>下也有地下矿藏！

请参考第2页以获取最常见的矿石的概览。@p9 @d0 <color=#ffffff>碳</color>矿石可以在平原、草地、热带草原和较低的丘陵中找到。
<color=#ffffff>铁</color>矿石从低丘陵到高山都有。
<color=#ffffff>铜</color>矿石可以在有（一些）树木或森林的地方找到。
<color=#ffffff>硅</color>矿石可以在海岸和水下或靠近水的地方找到。
注意：在更危险的地方，无论是由于环境条件还是生物，很少也有其他，<color=#ffffff>更有价值的材料</color>....

English: @q0 For the production you primarily need <color=#ffffff>carbon substrate</color>, <color=#ffffff>iron</color>, <color=#ffffff>copper</color> and <color=#ffffff>silicon</color>. All materials can be found in various biomes as lumps of ore. Maybe one or the other scientist has already left notes somewhere where to find them? @w2\n\nIf you want a higher yield, use your <color=#ffffff>handheld detector</color> and <color=#ffffff>scan for underground ore deposits</color>. The Robinson Protocol will give you further instructions when you have discovered such a deposit.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 你需要的主要生产材料有<color=#ffffff>碳复合材料</color>，<color=#ffffff>铁</color>，<color=#ffffff>铜</color>和<color=#ffffff>硅</color>。所有材料都可以在各种生态区域中以矿石块的形式找到。也许有一两个科学家已经在某处留下了关于在哪里找到它们的笔记？@w2 \n\n如果你想获得更高的产量，使用你的<color=#ffffff>手持探测器</color>并<color=#ffffff>扫描地下矿藏</color>。当你发现这样的矿藏时，罗宾逊协议会给出进一步的指示。

English: @d0 @q0There is the core!\n\nIn case you have considered <color=#ffffff>taking over the base</color>, would you like me to <color=#ffffff>guide you in the takeover</color> procedure?
Chinese (simplified): @d0 @q0 核心在这里！\n\n如果你考虑过<color=#ffffff>接管基地</color>，你希望我<color=#ffffff>指导你进行接管</color>程序吗？

English: <color=#44ff00>Yes, please guide me through the process!</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#44ff00>是的，请指导我完成整个过程！</color>

English: <color=#ff8800>No thanks. I already know how to capture a base</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ff8800>不，谢谢。我已经知道如何捕获基数</color>

English: Why should I do that? What are the advantages?
Chinese (simplified): 我为什么要这样做？有什么好处？

English: @d0As requested several times, I have stored all military relevant findings on the artifacts as well as the risk assessments on our operation in the <color=#ffffff>network's reporting database</color>. @w2 The entries can be <color=#ffffff>accessed by all consoles</color> in the network on all moons. @w2 Hopefully. @w2 I am not going to add any of the science reports, though. @w2 I'm not doing the work again for others to take the credit. @w2 I hope that by now they have at least unlocked access to the consoles for me everywhere...
Chinese (simplified): @d0 应多次请求，我已将所有与文物相关的军事发现以及对我们在<color=#ffffff>网络报告数据库</color>中的操作的风险评估存储起来。@w2 网络中所有卫星上的所有控制台<color=#ffffff>都可以访问</color>这些条目。@w2 希望如此。@w2 我不会添加任何科学报告。@w2 在我准备发表之前，我不会为别人做跑腿工作，让他们抢功劳。@w2 我希望现在他们至少为我解锁了所有地方的控制台访问权限...

English: @d0The database contains basic information about animals and plants on this moon.\n\nNote: This is a user administered database. No guarantee for completeness or correctness of the entries!
Chinese (simplified): @d0 数据库包含有关这个卫星上的动植物的基本信息。\n\n注意：这是一个用户管理的数据库。条目的完整性或正确性没有保证！

English: @d0The Crown sector was already so named by our forefathers. The arrangement of the four moons near the gas giant suggests a non-natural origin. Why the ancients have just settled in this system is perhaps more than just the coincidence as which it is always dismissed. The artifacts which are distributed over this mini moon system and which were examined basically already since the beginning of the space age by each member of the academy (unsuccessfully) speak a clear language. Now, apparently, it's my turn.\n- Tash Aki Talen
Chinese (simplified): @d0 皇冠星区已经被我们的祖先命名。气态巨星附近的四颗卫星的排列表明了非自然起源。古人选择在这个系统中定居，可能不仅仅是巧合，就像它总是被忽视的那样。分布在这个小卫星系统上的文物，自太空时代开始以来，学院的每个成员都试图检查（不成功）清楚地表明了一种语言。现在，显然，轮到我了。\n- Tash Aki Talen

English: @d0Akua, the lush sister of the four moons of the gas giant who's name the Academy has graciously bestowed as Crown. Little of note, but that works both for and against any intrepid scientist or explorer who ventures to her verdant forests; few predators or natural obstacles, but little to study. Outside of this feint energy signature the long range scanners are detecting, I suspect I will exit the transport, stretch in the sun, gently examine some trees, and then be on my way. - Tash Aki Talen @p9 @d0 Risk level: Low Climate: Clear/Cloudy/Rain/Wind Landscape: Mostly trees and grasslands with the occasional mountain arrangements and larger bodies of water. Flora: Trees, underbrush, and great stretches of grasslands. Plentiful herbs and edible plants. Fauna: A mixture of herbivores and scavengers. Predators can be present near the waterline and at night; Beware of Raptors hunting in packs. Natural Hazards: Radiation levels low. Colder temperatures nearer to the poles and at high altitudes. Water temperatures acceptable.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 阿库亚，是这个气态巨星的四颗卫星中郁郁葱葱的姐妹，学院慷慨地命名为皇冠。几乎没有什么值得注意的，但这对于任何冒险的科学家或探险家来说，既有好处也有坏处；他们冒险进入她郁郁葱葱的森林；几乎没有捕食者或自然障碍，但也没有什么可研究的。除了这个微弱的能量信号，远程扫描器正在探测，我怀疑我会离开运输工具，在太阳下伸展身体，轻轻地检查一些树木，然后继续我的旅程。 - Tash Aki Talen @p9 @d0 风险等级: 低 气候: 晴朗/多云/雨/风 地形: 大部分是树木和草原，偶尔有山脉排列和较大的水体。 植物: 树木，灌木丛，和大片的草原。草药和可食用植物丰富。 动物: 食草动物和食腐动物的混合。捕食者可能在水线附近和夜间出现；小心成群狩猎的猛禽。 自然危害: 辐射水平低。靠近极地和高海拔地区的气温较冷。水温可接受。

English: @d0Ningues, at least for this humble researcher, proved to be a bore. Nothing but ice and snow as far as the eye can see. There are some areas of Tundra sprinkled with trees and grass, but it produces exhaustion as opposed to inciting the imagination. - Tash Aki Talen @p9 @d0 Risk Level: Moderate Climate: Clear/Snow/ice Landscapes: Great ice mountain ranges set amidst valleys of Tundra. Also possesses smaller bodies of water. Flora: Arboreal trees, sparse grass. Less plentiful herbs and minimal edible plants. Fauna: Some neutral scavengers and herbivores. Warning: Predator threat higher. Natural Hazards: Radiation levels low. Temperatures can reach dangerous lows.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 对于我这个谦卑的研究员来说，宁格斯证明是无聊的。眼睛所及之处只有冰雪。有一些苔原地区点缀着树木和草，但它产生的是疲惫，而不是激发想象力。 - Tash Aki Talen @p9 @d0 风险等级: 中等 气候: 晴朗/雪/冰 地形: 大冰山山脉位于苔原山谷中。也有较小的水体。 植物: 树木，稀疏的草。草药较少，可食用植物最少。 动物: 一些中立的食腐动物和食草动物。警告：捕食者威胁更高。 自然危害: 辐射水平低。温度可能达到危险的低点。

English: @d0This moon is becoming more and more a dumping ground for all the wrecks and things that the Zirax and the Assembly no longer want to use. The toxicity is already increasing, but the radiation is getting worse with each new weapons test. The fauna has already gotten used to it. They use the debris as hiding places ... and as traps for their prey. So you shouldn't spend too much time outdoors, but watch out in the shadows as well. - Tash Aki Talen @p9 @d0 Risk Level: High Climate: Clear/Wind/Toxic Landscapes: Larger deserts with small oasis'. No mountain ranges but many great ranges of plateaus. Flora: Very sparse arrangement of desert trees. Little to no herbs or edible plants Fauna: Small packs of herbivores and the odd scavenger. Warning: Predator threat higher. Nights can be life-threatening. Natural Hazards: Radiation levels medium - an environmental suit is recommended. Temperatures can reach dangerous highs. Water presence minimal. Little to no escape from predators.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 这颗卫星越来越成为一个垃圾场，用于兹瑞克斯人和议会不再想要使用的所有残骸和东西。毒性已经在增加，但随着每一次新的武器测试，辐射越来越糟。动物已经习惯了它。它们使用碎片作为藏身之处……以及猎物的陷阱。所以你不应该在户外待太久，但也要当心阴影。 - Tash Aki Talen @p9 @d0 风险等级: 高 气候: 晴朗/风/有毒 地形: 更大的沙漠，有小绿洲。没有山脉，但有许多高原。 植物: 非常稀疏的沙漠树木排列。几乎没有草药或可食用植物 动物: 小型食草动物群体和偶尔的食腐动物。警告：捕食者威胁更高。夜晚可能是致命的。 自然危害: 辐射水平中等 - 建议穿环境服。温度可能达到危险的高点。水的存在最小。几乎没有逃脱捕食者的机会。

English: @d0Despite numerous and sternly worded papers on the subject, the Zirax continue to over-exploit this moon. I mean, *AHEM,* did they not see they were in triplicate?! If changes are not made, they will render it uninhabitable as opposed to its current beauty. Really, this is a paradise destination world fit for the most esteemed of meetings at the highest levels of the Assembly. A wonder for the entire galaxy with its sapphire waters, piercingly teal grasses and sparkling skies. - Tash Aki Talen @p9 @d0 Risk Level: Medium to High Climate: Clear/cloudy/rain/storms/toxic Landscapes: Grasslands, plateaus and endless bogs. Some larger bodies of water. Flora: Plentiful trees, vines, undergrowth, grass, and masses of moss. High level of herbs and edible plants. Fauna: Warning: Danger: Little neutral species. Packs of enemies, lone hunters, and other threats are the norm, NOT the exception. Do not go outside without proper weapon and armor. Natural Hazards: Radiation levels Low. Temperatures can reach dangerous highs. Water presence can hamper escape. Higher cliffs can create environments for predators to easily corner their prey. Landscape contours and swamp lush can make detection of approaching predators a critical threat.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 尽管有无数严厉的文件讨论这个问题，兹瑞克斯人继续过度开发这颗卫星。我的意思是，*咳咳*，他们没有看到文件是三份的吗？！如果不做出改变，他们将使其变得不适合居住，而不是它目前的美丽。真的，这是一个适合最高级别议会最尊贵会议的天堂目的地世界。它的蓝宝石水域、刺眼的蓝绿色草地和闪闪发光的天空，是整个银河系的奇观。 - Tash Aki Talen @p9 @d0 风险等级: 中等到高 气候: 晴朗/多云/雨/风暴/有毒 地形: 草原、高原和无尽的沼泽。一些较大的水体。 植物: 丰富的树木、藤蔓、下层植被、草和大量的苔藓。草药和可食用植物的水平很高。 动物: 警告：危险：几乎没有中立物种。成群的敌人、孤独的猎人和其他威胁是常态，而不是例外。没有适当的武器和盔甲不要外出。 自然危害: 辐射水平低。温度可能达到危险的高点。水的存在可能会妨碍逃生。更高的悬崖可以为捕食者创造环境，使它们容易将猎物逼入角落。地形轮廓和沼泽的茂密可能使检测接近的捕食者成为一个关键威胁。

English: @d0 Our old homeworld - already transformed into a sanctuary of the Talon culture ages ago, it is now only something like the spiritual center of our culture. The seat of the Academy of Science and thus the center of life has long since moved to Zeyhines, the seat of government of the Assembly. The Talon are scattered throughout the galaxy, yet they return here regularly. Hopefully, it will remain that way for a long time.\n- Tash Aki Talen
Chinese (simplified): @d0 我们古老的母星 - 早已转变为泰隆文化的圣地，现在只是我们文化的精神中心。科学学院的所在地，因此也是生命中心，早已转移到了议会的政府所在地Zeyhines。泰隆人遍布整个银河系，但他们定期返回这里。希望这种情况能持续很长时间。\n- Tash Aki Talen

English: Quests - Where to look up Todo & Next Steps?
Chinese (simplified): 任务 - 在哪里查找待办事项和下一步？

English:
@d0Use the <color=#ffffff>quest log in the PDA</color> to manage ALL your active quests remotely!
1. Open the PDA (<color=#44ff00>F1</color>) and click the tab '<color=#ffffff>Solo Missions</color>'. 
2. Click on the <color=#fbff00>dropdown arrow</color> of the desired group (e.g. <color=#fbff00>Talon</color>)
3. Select the entry '<color=#ffffff>Quest Log</color>' 
4. Click at the bottom on '<color=#44ff00>Activate Mission</color>' and follow the instructions
<color=#ffae00><u>IMPORTANT:</u></color><color=#ffae00> Quests that are tied to a planet will be CANCELLED if you leave that planet!</color>
Chinese (simplified):
@d0 使用 <color=#ffffff>PDA中的任务日志</color> 来远程管理你所有的活跃任务！
1. 打开PDA (<color=#44ff00>F1</color>) 并点击标签 '<color=#ffffff>单人任务</color>'. 
2. 点击所需组的 <color=#fbff00>下拉箭头</color> （例如 <color=#fbff00>泰隆</color>）
3. 选择条目 '<color=#ffffff>任务日志</color>' 
4. 在底部点击 '<color=#44ff00>激活任务</color>' 并按照指示操作
<color=#ffae00><u>重要：</u></color><color=#ffae00> 如果你离开那个星球，与星球绑定的任务将会被取消！</color>

English: @d0 @q0 All right, have it your way.\n\nBut remember, I could always use your help with this!
Chinese (simplified): @d0 @q0 好吧，就按你说的做。\n\n但记住，我随时都可能需要你的帮助来处理这个！

English: @d0 @q0 All right, Son. Have it your way.\n\nBut remember, I could always use your help with this!
Chinese (simplified): @d0 @q0 好吧，孩子。就按你说的做。\n\n但记住，我随时都可能需要你的帮助来处理这个！

English: Tales of Tash - Private Log Archive
Chinese (simplified): Tales of Tash - 私人日志档案

English:
@q0 @d0 Open the Blueprint Factory (<color=#44ff00>F2</color>) and select your base from the <color=#ffffff>COMPLETED</color> list <color=#00ffff>( 1 )</color>. Then click <color=#ffffff>SPAWN</color> in the <color=#ffffff>lower right screen</color>. <color=#00ffff>( 2 ). </color>
Use <color=#00ff00>PAGE UP/DOWN</color>, <color=#00ff00>HOME/END</color> and <color=#00ff00>INS/DEL</color> buttons and <color=#00ff00>Mouseview</color> for positioning. Use left mouse button to place. 
<color=#ffffff></color>
<color=#ffffff>When the frame is placed, this tutorial will continue automatically!</color>
Chinese (simplified):
@q0 @d0 打开蓝图工厂（<color=#44ff00>F2</color>），从 <color=#ffffff>已完成</color> 列表中选择你的基地 <color=#00ffff>( 1 )</color>。然后点击 <color=#ffffff>右下屏幕</color> 的 <color=#ffffff>生成</color> <color=#00ffff>( 2 )</color>。

使用 <color=#00ff00>PAGE UP/DOWN</color>，<color=#00ff00>HOME/END</color> 和 <color=#00ff00>INS/DEL</color> 按钮和 <color=#00ff00>鼠标视角</color> 进行定位。使用鼠标左键放置。

<color=#ffffff></color>

<color=#ffffff>当框架放置好后，这个教程将自动继续！</color>

English: @q0 @d0 This tutorial will assist you in <color=#ffffff>building an Hover Vessel (HV)</color> to increase <color=#ffffff>protection</color> and <color=#ffffff>transportation</color> capabilities!\n\nPlease click on <color=#ffffff>CONTINUE</color> if you want to start now. Click on MAYBE LATER if you have changed your mind. In this case you can always start the tutorial again in the 'Tutorial Tab' of the PDA (<color=#44ff00>F1</color>)!
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 这个教程将协助你 <color=#ffffff>建造一个悬浮飞船 (HV)</color> 以增加 <color=#ffffff>保护</color> 和 <color=#ffffff>运输</color> 能力！\n\n如果你想现在开始，请单击 <color=#ffffff>继续</color>。如果你改变了主意，请单击 <color=#ffffff>也许稍后</color>。在这种情况下，你可以随时在 PDA（<color=#44ff00>F1</color>）的 '教程标签页' 中重新开始教程！

English:
@q0 @d0 We need to craft a <color=#fbff00>Core, </color>a <color=#fbff00>Generator</color> and a <color=#fbff00>Fuel Tank</color>. To make the vessel hover, we will need <color=#fbff00>4x Ground Repulsor Engines</color> and a <color=#fbff00>Cockpit</color> for steering.We will also add a <color=#fbff00>Cargo Box</color> to improve transportation capabilities!

Use the <color=#ffffff>Portable Constructor</color> to build everything. 
The required templates are <color=#fbff00>marked</color> in the overview below.  

After having build the devices, <color=#ffffff><u>equip them onto your toolbar</u> to continue the tutorial!</color>
Chinese (simplified):
@q0 @d0 我们需要制作一个 <color=#fbff00>核心，</color>一个 <color=#fbff00>发电机</color> 和一个 <color=#fbff00>燃料箱</color>。为了让飞船悬浮，我们需要 <color=#fbff00>4x 地面排斥引擎</color> 和一个用于转向的 <color=#fbff00>驾驶舱</color>。我们还将添加一个 <color=#fbff00>货箱</color> 以提高运输能力！


使用 <color=#ffffff>便携式建造机</color> 来建造一切。
所需的模板在下面的概览中 <color=#fbff00>标记</color>。

建造完设备后，<color=#ffffff><u>将它们装备到你的工具栏</u> 以继续教程！</color>
<color=#00ffff>引导教程：悬浮飞船 (BP)</color><color=#00ffff> - 设备</color>

English: @q0 @d0 For the production you primarily need <color=#ffffff>carbon substrate</color>, <color=#ffffff>iron</color>, <color=#ffffff>copper</color> and <color=#ffffff>silicon</color>. All materials can be found in various biomes as lumps of ore. @w2\nIf you want a higher yield, use your <color=#ffffff>handheld detector</color> and <color=#ffffff>scan for underground ore deposits</color>. The Robinson Protocol will give you further instructions when you have discovered such a deposit. @w2\nIf you cannot find anything, look around for old mining sites or camps! Someone might have left some notes where to find the resources!
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d0 生产主要需要 <color=#ffffff>碳复合材料</color>，<color=#ffffff>铁</color>，<color=#ffffff>铜</color> 和 <color=#ffffff>硅</color>。所有材料都可以在各种生物群落中以矿石块的形式找到。@w2 \n如果你想获得更高的产量，请使用你的 <color=#ffffff>手持探测器</color> 并 <color=#ffffff>扫描地下矿床</color>。当你发现这样的矿床时，罗宾逊协议会给你进一步的指示。@w2 \n如果你找不到任何东西，四处寻找旧的矿场或营地！有人可能留下了一些笔记，告诉你在哪里可以找到资源！

English: Can I look up these information somewhere again?
Chinese (simplified): 我能再找找这些信息吗？

English:
@q0 @d0 You can read this and other instructions for starting the Guided Tutorial at the following location:

1. Open the PDA (<color=#44ff00>F1</color>) 
2. Open the TUTORIAL tab
3. Select a tutorial step from the list, e.g. '<color=#ffffff>Guided Tutorial: Base (BP)</color>'. 

On the right side in the <color=#ffffff>DESCRIPTION </color>field you will find all the information and steps you need to start and/or continue with the guided tutorial!
Chinese (simplified):
@q0 @d0 你可以在以下位置阅读此和其他开始引导教程的说明：

1. 打开 PDA（<color=#44ff00>F1</color>）
2. 打开教程标签页
3. 从列表中选择一个教程步骤，例如 '<color=#ffffff>引导教程：基地 (BP)</color>'。

在右侧的 <color=#ffffff>描述 </color>字段中，你将找到开始和/或继续引导教程所需的所有信息和步骤！

English:
@q0 @d0 As a first shelter you can build a very simple <color=#ffffff>Base</color> and expand it later! I recommend using <color=#ffffff>wood</color> or <color=#ffffff>carbon substrate</color> as they are fairly easy to obtain. One thing to keep in mind is to find a <color=#ffffff>good spot </color>to set up the shelter - with resources like water and ores nearby for example! 

In this tutorial, I'll show you how to get a quick result using the <color=#ffffff>Blueprint Libary</color> (<color=#44ff00>F2</color>) by using a <color=#ffffff>FRAME</color>.

We will then equip this frame with the necessary functional parts.
<color=#ffffff></color>
Chinese (simplified):
@q0 @d0 作为第一个避难所，你可以建造一个非常简单的<color=#ffffff>基地</color>，以后再进行扩展！我建议使用<color=#ffffff>木材</color>或<color=#ffffff>碳复合材料</color>，因为它们相对容易获得。需要注意的一点是找到一个<color=#ffffff>好的位置</color>来搭建避难所——例如附近有水源和矿石等资源！

在这个教程中，我将向你展示如何通过使用<color=#ffffff>蓝图库</color>（<color=#44ff00>F2</color>）和<color=#ffffff>框架</color>来快速获得结果。

然后我们将为这个框架装备必要的功能部件。
<color=#ffffff></color>

English:
@q0 @d0 Open the Blueprint Factory (<color=#44ff00>F2</color>) and select your hover vessel from the <color=#ffffff>COMPLETED</color> list <color=#00ffff>( 1 )</color>. Then click <color=#ffffff>SPAWN</color> in the <color=#ffffff>lower right screen</color>. <color=#00ffff>( 2 ). </color>
Use <color=#00ff00>PAGE UP/DOWN</color>, <color=#00ff00>HOME/END</color> and <color=#00ff00>INS/DEL</color> buttons and <color=#00ff00>Mouseview</color> for positioning. Use left mouse button to place. 
<color=#ffffff></color>
<color=#ffffff>When the frame is placed, this tutorial will continue automatically!</color>
Chinese (simplified):
@q0 @d0 打开蓝图工厂（<color=#44ff00>F2</color>）并从<color=#ffffff>已完成</color>列表中选择你的悬浮飞船<color=#00ffff>( 1 )</color>。然后点击<color=#ffffff>右下角屏幕</color>的<color=#ffffff>生成</color>按钮<color=#00ffff>( 2 )</color>。

使用<color=#00ff00>PAGE UP/DOWN</color>、<color=#00ff00>HOME/END</color>和<color=#00ff00>INS/DEL</color>按钮以及<color=#00ff00>鼠标视角</color>进行定位。使用鼠标左键放置。

<color=#ffffff></color>
<color=#ffffff>当框架放置好后，这个教程将自动继续！</color>

English:
@q0 @d0 You can read this and other instructions for starting the Guided Tutorial at the following location:

1. Open the PDA (<color=#44ff00>F1</color>) 
2. Open the TUTORIAL tab
3. Select a tutorial step from the list, e.g. '<color=#ffffff>Guided Tutorial: Hover Vessel (BP)</color>'. 

On the right side in the <color=#ffffff>DESCRIPTION </color>field you will find all the information and steps you need to start and/or continue with the guided tutorial!
Chinese (simplified):
@q0 @d0 你可以在以下位置阅读本教程和其他开始引导教程的说明：

1. 打开PDA（<color=#44ff00>F1</color>）
2. 打开教程标签页
3. 从列表中选择一个教程步骤，例如'<color=#ffffff>引导教程：悬浮飞船（BP）</color>'。

在右侧的<color=#ffffff>描述</color>字段中，你将找到开始和/或继续引导教程所需的所有信息和步骤！

English:
@d0 @q0 If you played the tutorial on Akua, let us know how you liked it, if you learned anything and how your gaming experience turned out in general.

Note: Before filling out this tutorial questionnaire, you <color=#ffffff>should at least have been in space</color> or even out of the orbit of the gas giant. 
<color=#00ffff></color>
<color=#00ffff>If you get STUCK , please use the 'Report a bug' answer option on the MAIN page instead!</color>
Chinese (simplified):
@d0 @q0 如果你在Akua上玩了教程，请告诉我们你喜欢它吗，你学到了什么，以及你的游戏体验总体如何。

注意：在填写这个教程问卷之前，你至少应该已经进入太空，甚至已经离开了气态巨星的轨道。
<color=#00ffff></color>
<color=#00ffff>如果你遇到问题，请在主页面使用'报告一个错误'的选项！</color>

English:
So... since you're obviously new to this planet, I'll overlook your transgression.

But see that it doesn't happen again, Friend. 

I won't be able to be so gracious a second time.
Chinese (simplified):
那么... 既然你明显是这个星球上的新人，我会对你的过失视而不见。

但要确保这种事情不再发生，朋友。

我第二次可不会这么宽容了。

English: Your kind is not welcome here. \n\nGet lost!
Chinese (simplified): 你的种族在这里不受欢迎。\n\n滚开！

English: Your kind is not welcome here. \n\nGet lost!
Chinese (simplified): 你的种族在这里不受欢迎。\n\n滚开！

English: Special offers are always to be expected!
Chinese (simplified): 总是可以期待特别优惠！

English: Welcome {PlayerName}! You have been logged in to the..@w2 Galactic @w1 Information @w1 Network @w2 ..where the latest news never grows old! @w2 Please make a choice from the menu below
Chinese (simplified): 欢迎{PlayerName}！你已经登录到.. @w2 Galactic @w1 Information @w1 Network @w2 ..最新的新闻永远不会过时！@w2 请从下面的菜单中选择

English:
Welcome to the News Portal of the
<size=175%><color=#00ffff>G</color>alactic <color=#00ffff>I</color>nformation <color=#00ffff>N</color>etwork @w2</size>

Please choose a CATEGORY from below.
Chinese (simplified):
欢迎来到
<size=175%><color=#00ffff>G</color>alactic <color=#00ffff>I</color>nformation <color=#00ffff>N</color>etwork @w2 </size>

请选择下面的一个分类。

English: Strange incident observed in Ellyon system @w2\nA farmer of the local Talon tribe reported to our newsagent Ellias, that while he was drying his clothes not far from the [translation not possible] site, a bright blue light flashed the sky. A few minutes later, a metal object crashed into the ground near an ancient dumping site. As the eyewitness told us, he found no traces of an object when he approached the site some hours later. Officials from both the Zirax Empire and the local Polaris Megacorp denied any knowledge of this event. @w2 Stay tuned! We'll investigate further!
Chinese (simplified): 在艾丽隆星系观察到的奇怪事件@w2 \n当地泰隆部落的一位农民向我们的新闻代理埃利亚斯报告说，当他在[无法翻译]遗址附近晾晒衣物时，天空中突然闪过一道明亮的蓝光。几分钟后，一个金属物体在古老的倾倒场附近坠毁。正如目击者告诉我们的，当他几小时后接近现场时，没有发现任何物体的痕迹。兹瑞克斯帝国和当地的极星超级企业的官员都否认了对这一事件的了解。@w2 请继续关注！我们将进一步调查！

English: Update version 1.3 incoming! @w2\nNew software version! Update 1.3 adds several bugfixes and new toys for the creative minds out there. The mission index has been updated as well. Check your PDA (F1) and enlist for new adventures. The new update will also activate the 'Ambassador Login' of GIN. Make sure to bring your factions credibility seals to activate! All info are available at EMPYRIONONLINE.COM. The management wants to thank all our testers. @w2\nNo volunteers were harmed in the making of this version @w2 .. we assume.
Chinese (simplified): 即将更新版本1.3！@w2 \n新软件版本！1.3版本增加了几个错误修复和新玩具，供有创造力的人使用。任务索引也已更新。请检查你的PDA（F1）并报名参加新的冒险。新更新还将激活银河信息网络的'大使登录'。确保你带来了派系的信誉印章来激活！所有信息都可以在EMPYRIONONLINE.COM找到。管理层想要感谢我们所有的测试者。@w2 \n在这个版本的制作过程中，没有志愿者受到伤害 @w2 .. 我们假设。

English: <color=#00ffff>Welcome to the AMBASSADOR contact page!</color>\nContact an ambassador of any faction and use your earned credibility seals to improve your standing. For each step from <color=#ff7b00>hostile </color>to <color=#ffb875>unfriendly </color>and <color=#ffb875>unfriendly </color>to <color=#c0c0c0>neutral</color>, one seal is consumed. You cannot improve your reputation with the faction beyond neutral with the faction credibility seals, though. You can earn seals by completing credibility missions. Some story missions and quests (if available for this faction) offer them as well.\nIMPORTANT: You need to have the seals in your inventory to successfully complete your request!
Chinese (simplified): <color=#00ffff>欢迎来到大使联系页面！</color>\n联系任何派系的大使，并使用你获得的信誉印章来提高你的立场。从<color=#ff7b00>敌对</color>到<color=#ffb875>不友好</color>，以及<color=#ffb875>不友好</color>到<color=#c0c0c0>中立</color>，每一步都会消耗一个印章。不过，你不能使用派系信誉印章将与派系的声誉提高到中立以上。你可以通过完成信誉任务来获得印章。一些故事任务和任务（如果这个派系有提供的话）也会提供它们。\n重要提示：你需要在你的库存中有印章才能成功完成你的请求！

English: I understand and want to proceed.

Chinese (simplified): 返回银河信息网络主菜单

English: Selection denied.\n\nYou do not have the required reputation (below NEUTRAL) to start negotiations with this faction, or you do not have any or not enough credibility seals in your inventory, or you have not made contact or discovered this faction yet.
Chinese (simplified): 选择被拒绝。\n\n你没有所需的声誉（低于中立）来开始与这个派系的谈判，或者你的库存中没有或不够信誉印章，或者你还没有与这个派系接触或发现它。

English: Please donate ONE credibility seal of the <color=#ff0000>Zirax Empire</color> to restore NEUTRAL reputation.
Chinese (simplified): 请捐赠一个<color=#ff0000>兹瑞克斯帝国</color>的信誉印章来恢复中立声誉。

English:
@d0 Please select a faction you want to improve your standing with.

Note:
- For restoring Unfriendly to Neutral, ONE faction credibility seal is required.
- For restoring Hostile to Neutral, TWO faction credibility seals are required.
- Credibility Seals need to be placed in your inventory.
Chinese (simplified):
@d0 请选择一个你想要提高声望的派系。

注意：
- 恢复不友好到中立，需要一个派系信誉印章。
- 恢复敌对到中立，需要两个派系信誉印章。
- 信誉印章需要放在你的库存中。

English:
Thanks a lot, {PlayerName}!

Your reputation with the selected faction has been restored to <color=#ffff00>NEUTRAL </color>level.

Fly carefully.
Chinese (simplified):
非常感谢，{PlayerName}！

你与选定派系的声望已恢复到<color=#ffff00>中立</color>级别。

小心飞行。

English: My people and I greet you Stranger. I've heard from your actions and your name many talked about was... {PlayerName}, right? Well then, we are not greedy, so we share this Epic Gift with you. You get it only once, so take care of it with your life!
Chinese (simplified): 我的人民和我向你问好，陌生人。我听说你的行为和你的名字被很多人谈论过... {PlayerName}，对吧？那么，我们并不贪婪，所以我们与你分享这个史诗级的礼物。你只能得到一次，所以请用生命去珍惜它！

English: Hello... Human or {PlayerName} as they call you. You got my respect to get Honored with my Race. Take this Token as gift but when you lose it, we will kill you.
Chinese (simplified): 你好... 人类或 {PlayerName}，正如他们称呼你的。你得到了我的尊重，以获得我的种族的荣誉。请接受这个代币作为礼物，但如果你丢失了它，我们会杀了你。

English: Hello {PlayerName}. Your actions speak for yourself and we thank you for all what you have done for us. Take this Token as gift and use it wisely.
Chinese (simplified): 你好 {PlayerName}。你的行为代表了你自己，我们感谢你为我们所做的一切。请接受这个代币作为礼物，并明智地使用它。

English: You are not worth to speak to me! Get out of my sight!
Chinese (simplified): 你不值得和我说话！从我的视线中消失！

English: You got my gift already and dare to talk to me again?!? Get out of my sight or I'll kill you!
Chinese (simplified): 你已经收到了我的礼物，还敢再和我说话？！？从我的视线中消失，否则我会杀了你！

English: Sorry, but I don't think it's time for us yet. Go and help my Race and come back when we are honored from your actions!
Chinese (simplified): 对不起，但我认为现在还不是我们的时候。去帮助我的种族，当我们因你的行为而感到荣幸时再回来！

English: You got my gift already. Please don't tell me that you lost it...
Chinese (simplified): 你已经收到了我的礼物。请不要告诉我你丢失了它...

English: Who are you? As long as my people don't know you, I don't know you either. Go away!
Chinese (simplified): 你是谁？只要我的人民不认识你，我也不认识你。走开！

English: You got our gift already! If you lost it, our people will never forget it!
Chinese (simplified): 你已经收到了我们的礼物！如果你丢失了它，我们的人民将永远不会忘记它！

English: You need all 3 Epic Gift Tokens from the Factions to be able to play the Gold Freighter Heist Mission!
Chinese (simplified): 你需要所有3个派系的史诗级礼物代币才能玩 黄金货运船抢劫任务！

English: Well done and enjoy the Treasures! Make sure to not lose those Tokens!
Chinese (simplified): 做得好，享受宝藏！确保不要丢失那些代币！

English: What mission is this? (Start the Mission)
The Gold Freighter Heist Mission is a legendary farm Mission. Only to those accessible, who got the Epic Gift Tokens from all 3 Factions!
Chinese (simplified): 黄金货运船抢劫任务是一个传奇的农场任务。只有那些可以获得所有3个派系的史诗级礼物代币的人才能访问！

English: Emergency Message: The planet has fallen...@w2We were invaded....@p6 The largest Defender planet in the universe....@w2wiped out. I can see in the distance...@w3 The city is destroyed...@p7 I pray for your souls...@w3 perhaps Deep in this underground facility... @w3 The Invaders won’t find you all... Maybe one day you will wake up... @p7 The Defender Origin cannot be forgotten ....Never forgotten...@w6
Chinese (simplified): 紧急消息： The planet has fallen...@w2 We were invaded....@p6 The largest Defender planet in the universe....@w2 wiped out. I can see in the distance...@w3 The city is destroyed...@p7 I pray for your souls...@w3 perhaps Deep in this underground facility... @w3 The Invaders won’t find you all... Maybe one day you will wake up... @p7 The Defender Origin cannot be forgotten ....Never forgotten...@w6

English: Hey {PlayerName}! Welcome to the Official Server @w2 I'm your friendly admin for all your issues. @w2 If you need me or need admin assistance, you can contact me on our forum or on our official discord.
Chinese (simplified): 嘿 {PlayerName}！欢迎来到官方服务器 @w2 我是你友好的管理员，负责处理你所有的问题。@w2 如果你需要我或需要管理员帮助，你可以在我们的论坛或我们的官方Discord上联系我。

English: Can you give me the Discord address?
Can you give me the forum address?
May I have a key to Santa Claus his workshop?
Chinese (simplified): 我可以要一把去圣诞老人工作室的钥匙吗？

English: Hi {PlayerName}! @w2 So you received an invitation from Santa Claus? @w2 You come to the right place then!
Chinese (simplified): 嗨 {PlayerName}！@w2 所以你收到了圣诞老人的邀请？@w2 那你来对地方了！

English: Hohoho, {PlayerName}! @w2 Welcome to my secret workshop. @w2 Don't forget to talk to Mrs. Claus for one of her delicious cakes!
Chinese (simplified): 呵呵呵，{PlayerName}！@w2 欢迎来到我的秘密工作室。@w2 不要忘记和克劳斯夫人谈谈她的美味蛋糕！

English: @q0 You have been bad this year? @w2 I see... @w2 I will delete all your structures...
Chinese (simplified): @q0 你今年表现得不好吗？@w2 我明白了... @w2 我会删除你所有的建筑...

English: @q0 hohoho, Looking in my book you have been good indeed. @w2 I also see your wishlist. @w2 Here are your presents, hope you like them! @w2 Merry Christmas and a Happy 2022, {PlayerName}!
Chinese (simplified): @q0 呵呵呵，看看我的书，你今年确实表现得很好。@w2 我也看到了你的愿望清单。@w2 这是你的礼物，希望你能喜欢！@w2 圣诞快乐，2022年快乐，{PlayerName}！

English: @q0 Nono, you already had your present. @w2 One present per player.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 不不，你已经收到了你的礼物。@w2 每位玩家一份礼物。

English: @q0 Sorry but no, we dont give a replacement cards. @w2 You can try asking Taelyn Bot.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 对不起，不，我们不提供替换卡。@w2 你可以尝试询问Taelyn Bot。

English: @q0 Ofcours! @w2 I just have to check if your name is on my list @w1 . @w1 . @w1 . @w2 Found you! @w2 Here is the Access Card. @w2 Mery Christmas!
Chinese (simplified): @q0 当然可以！@w2 我只需要检查一下你的名字是否在我的名单上 @w1 . @w1 . @w1 . @w2 找到你了！@w2 这是访问卡。@w2 圣诞快乐！

English: Hello dear, did you get your present already from Santa?
Chinese (simplified): 亲爱的，你已经从圣诞老人那里收到礼物了吗？

English: @q0 Oh you want one of my delicious cakes? @w2 Fresh baked, but don't tell Santa!
Chinese (simplified): @q0 哦，你想要我的美味蛋糕吗？@w2 刚出炉的，但别告诉圣诞老人！

English: @q0 Nono, you don't get another one. @w2 Thats not healty!
Chinese (simplified): @q0 不行，你不能再要一个了。@w2 那不健康！

English: Welcome {PlayerName}! You have been logged in to the..@w2\nTaelyn's @w1 Admin @w1 Pannel
Ive lost my Santa's Workshop Access Card...
Chinese (simplified): 我丢失了我的圣诞老人工作室访问卡...

English: @q0 So you lost your card? @w2 Ive got one spair for you. @w2 Don't lose it again!
Chinese (simplified): @q0 所以你丢失了你的卡片？@w2 我有一个备用的给你。@w2 别再丢了！

English: @q0 Please make a choice from the menu below...
Chinese (simplified): @q0 请从下面的菜单中做出选择...

English: Hohoho, {PlayerName}! @w2 The Magic Elfs are still bussy makeing all presents. @w2 Come back on Christmas day!
Chinese (simplified): 呵呵呵，{PlayerName}！@w2 魔法精灵们还在忙着制作所有的礼物。@w2 圣诞节那天再回来吧！

English: Hello dear. @w2 We are still working hard to get ready for Christmas. @w2 Come back later...
Chinese (simplified): 亲爱的。@w2 我们仍在努力为圣诞节做准备。@w2 稍后再回来...

English: Do you have any hats for me?
@q0 What hat would you like? @w2 I have several in stock.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 你想要什么帽子？@w2 我有几种库存。

English: I need a replacement Taelyn Bot Decoration Item
Chinese (simplified): 我需要一个替换的泰琳机器人装饰物品

English: @q0 Sure i can make another one for you if you have 1000 credits.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 当然我可以为你再做一个，如果你有1000信用点的话。

English: @q0 How would you like to pay?
Oh oke, ill go get some money
@q0 You don't seem to have the 1000 credits, sorry!
Chinese (simplified): @q0 你似乎没有1000信用点，抱歉！

English: @q0 Here you go, Ive placed it in your inventory.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 给你，我已经把它放在你的库存里了。

English: @q0 Ofcours you can have one of those! @w2 Here you go :-)
Chinese (simplified): @q0 当然你可以拥有其中一个！@w2 给你 :-)

English: @q0 Ofcours you can have one of those! @w2 Here you go :-)
Chinese (simplified): @q0 当然你可以拥有其中一个！@w2 给你 :-)

English: @q0 Ofcours you can have one of those! @w2 Here you go :-)
Chinese (simplified): @q0 当然你可以拥有其中一个！@w2 给你 :-)

English: @q0 Ofcours you can have one of those! @w2 Here you go :-)
Chinese (simplified): @q0 当然你可以拥有其中一个！@w2 给你 :-)

请在螳螂系统中报告错误

English: Taelyn Bot => than TSM Bot XD
Welcome to the GIN Store! @w2\n\nSpend your precious credits on stuff that you absolutely need to make your life livable!
Chinese (simplified): 欢迎来到GIN商店！@w2 \n\n把你宝贵的信用点花在你绝对需要的东西上，让你的生活变得可以忍受！

English:
GIN Store Gallery proudly presents Rumpelstilskins '13 masterpieces' exhibition. @w2

Make a lucky draw and gift yourself a piece of his work for only 1299*! @w2
<size=10.8>*No refunds. Pricing in other locations might be higher.</size>
Chinese (simplified):
GIN商店画廊自豪地呈现Rumpelstilskins的'13件杰作'展览。@w2 

只需1299*，你就可以抽到他的一件作品作为礼物！@w2 
<size=10.8>*不退换。其他地点的价格可能会更高。</size>

English: We are afraid you do not have enough money to spent on one of the precious art works of Rumpelstiskin.\n\nYou need at least 1299 credits on our <color=#ffffff>bank account!</color>
Chinese (simplified): 我们担心你没有足够的钱来购买Rumpelstiskin珍贵的艺术作品之一。\n\n你至少需要在我们的<color=#ffffff>银行账户！</color>上有1299信用点

English: @d0 A Rest\nDescription: Taking a rest is what often helps to assess even the worst situation.\nSentiment: Calm blue and green
Chinese (simplified): @d0 休息一下\n描述：休息通常有助于评估最糟糕的情况。\n情感：平静的蓝色和绿色

English: @d0 Biker\nDescription: For those that want more action on their bare naked walls. Mind the gap.\nSentiment: Active sandy red
Chinese (simplified): @d0 摩托车手\n描述：对于那些希望在他们赤裸的墙壁上看到更多动作的人。注意间隙。\n情感：活跃的沙红色

English: Congratulations!\n\nYou are now an owner of one of Rumpelstilskins' exclusive masterpieces. Enjoy!
Chinese (simplified): 恭喜！\n\n你现在是Rumpelstilskins的一件独家杰作的所有者。享受吧！

English: @d0 Alien World\nDescription: A lot of worlds in this galaxy are dangerous even for the feared Zirax Troopers and their dogs.\nSentiment: Menacing green tones and blue
Chinese (simplified): @d0 外星世界\n描述：在这个星系中，有很多世界即使对于令人畏惧的兹瑞克斯士兵和他们的狗来说也是危险的。\n情感：威胁性的绿色调和蓝色

English: @d0 Trader\nDescription: It is said that this artwork destroys itself when your bank account reaches zero.\nSentiment: Strong blue and purple
Chinese (simplified): @d0 商人\n描述：据说当你的银行账户归零时，这件艺术品会自我毁灭。\n情感：强烈的蓝色和紫色

English: @d0 Talon\nDescription: An early work. A rare oil painting of the unapproachable natives residing mostly in the Ellyon system.\nSentiment: Refreshing green and blue
Chinese (simplified): @d0 泰隆\n描述：早期作品。一幅罕见的油画，描绘了主要居住在艾丽隆星系的难以接近的土著。\n情感：清新的绿色和蓝色

English: @d0 Taking A Break\nDescription: Dump your sorrows at the wayside and start refreshed into new adventures.\nSentiment: Relaxing orange and dark green
Chinese (simplified): @d0 休息一下\n描述：把悲伤丢在路边，开始新的冒险。\n情感：放松的橙色和深绿色

English: @d0 Survivor\nDescription: Those having survived in this galaxy have achieved far more than just having lived through a crash.\nSentiment: Menacing mix of blue, black and purple
Chinese (simplified): @d0 幸存者\n描述：在这个星系中幸存下来的人，他们所取得的成就远远超过了仅仅经历一场坠毁。\n情感：威胁性的蓝色、黑色和紫色混合

English: @d0 Stranger\nDescription: When exploring the galaxy you will find strange and crazy creatures.\nSentiment: Expressive orange, brown and blue
Chinese (simplified): @d0 陌生人\n描述：当你探索银河系时，你会发现奇怪和疯狂的生物。\n情感：表达性的橙色、棕色和蓝色

English: @d0 Sole Desert\nDescription: Wandering in the desolation of a lost world.\nSentiment: Relaxing brown, orange and blue
Chinese (simplified): @d0 唯一的沙漠\n描述：在失落世界的荒凉中徘徊。\n情感：放松的棕色、橙色和蓝色

English: @d0 A New World\nDescription: The joys of the first breath on a new world.\nSentiment: Relaxing mixed colors
Chinese (simplified): @d0 新世界\n描述：在新世界上的第一口呼吸的喜悦。\n情感：放松的混合色彩

English: @d0 Jump!\nDescription: We often read about people that dreamt of being able to fly. At least jumping is possible for anyone!\nSentiment: Action green and dark green
Chinese (simplified): @d0 跳！\n描述：我们经常读到那些梦想能够飞翔的人。至少跳跃对任何人来说都是可能的！\n情感：行动绿色和深绿色

English: @d0 Foreign World\nDescription: For those that love wreckages on the horizon and dust in your hairs in the evenings.\nSentiment: Relaxing orange and dark brown
Chinese (simplified): @d0 外星世界\n描述：对于那些喜欢地平线上的废墟和晚上头发里的灰尘的人。\n情感：放松的橙色和深棕色

English: @d0 Don't hide!\nDescription: The least places are really safe when trying to hide from a giant predator.\nSentiment: Frightening blue and orange
Chinese (simplified): @d0 不要躲藏！\n描述：当试图躲避一个巨大的捕食者时，最不可能的地方实际上是安全的。\n情感：可怕的蓝色和橙色
